sulfurous.description: It has this overwhelming [b]sulfurous[/b] smell, like burnt stone and brimstone hanging thick in your nose.

floral.description: It has this sweet, loving [b]floral[/b] smell, [i]unnaturally sweet[/i] and out of place in this dark place.

metallic.description: It has this lingering [b]metallic[/b] smell, [i]sharp[/i] and cold, like blood on iron.

musty.description: It has this overwhelming [b]musty[/b] smell, thick with age and the weight of forgotten dust.

rotting.description: It has this lingering of [b]rot[/b] smell, like flesh and wood left too long in the dark.

sweet.description: It has such a [b]sweet[/b] smell, [i]sickly[/i] and cloying, like overripe fruit gone wrong.

ozone.description: It smells of [b]ozone[/b], crackling and [i]charged[/i], like a lightning storm sealed in stone.

mossy.description: It has this overwhelming [b]mossy[/b] smell, [i]damp[/i] and earthy, like deep forest groves reclaimed by time.

parchment.description: Old [b]parchment[/b] and ink is the predominant smell, like an old library long abandoned, fragile knowledge long entombed.

blood.description: It has this pungent smell of [b]blood[/b], fresh and warm, as if something just died nearby.
